mapper.select: SELECT id, table_id, store_id, started_at, ended_at, is_active FROM table_session WHERE table_id = #{tableId} AND is_active = true ORDER BY started_at DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO table_session (table_id, store_id, started_at, ended_at, is_active) VALUES (#{tableId}, #{storeId}, #{startedAt}, #{endedAt}, #{isActive})
